content.text:
[@André Staltz](@QlCTpvY7p9ty2yOFrv1WU1AE88aoQc4Y7wYal7PFc+w=.ed25519)

It's currently unclear. They're *supposed* to be blocked from downloading your data, but [this thread](%K71cvcnjp8N5gRjgryP1Y3VqfhYSCI3vHpvpGcILeqY=.sha256) seems to show that there may be pubs/bugs/users that are passing along messages that they shouldn't.
